name: Jackson Triggs Black Reserve
Cabaret Franc / Cabaret Sauvignon (Niagara)
house wine.description: Deep garnet colour; complex aromas of cassis, cedar and spices. Dry palate with medium to full body and full flavor on the finish

house wine.name: Jackson Triggs Black Reserve Chardonnay (Niagara)
house wine.description: Pale straw; melon, apple and light oak aromas with a crisp, clean flavor

house wine.name: Mezzomondo Pinot Grigio / Chardonnay (Italy)
house wine.description: Clear pale straw; melon, light citrus aromas with dry, medium body and crisp citrus flavours

house wine.name: Mezzomondo Negroamaro (Italy)
house wine.description: Deep ruby-red colour; cherry. Smooth texture with ripe cherry, plum and woody flavours; Ion, cherry finish

house wine.name: Apelia Red (Greece)
house wine.description: Bright purple/red colour; black cherry, vinous, peppery aromas. Young fresh fruit flavour; well balanced with soft tannin, medium body and finish

house wine.name: Apelia White (Greece)
house wine.description: Light lemon yellow colour; clean soft fruit aroma with a fresh light lemon flavour; crispy, dry finish

name: Inniskillin Niagara Series
Meriot / Cabernet Sauvignon (Niagara)
red wine.description: Medium deep ruby; aromas and flavours of oak, cassis, plum, blackberry jam, vanilla and cedar. Dry, medium bodied, with good depth of fruit, structured tannins and good length

red wine.name: Jackson Triggs Black Reserve Merlot (Niagara)
red wine.description: Medium ruby red colour; aromas and flavours of cassis, cherry and herb with light oak notes; dry, medium bodied, medium tannin and good acidity on finish

red wine.name: Marcus James Malbec (Argentina)
red wine.description: Medium deep ruby red/garnet; aromas and flavours of ripe black berry, currant, plum, cherry and coffee notes; Dry, medium bodied, with soft tannins; medium long finish, warm and spicy notes; easy drinking style

red wine.name: Hardy's VR Shiraz (Australia)
red wine.description: Deep red, bright cherry with raspberry, spice and vanilla aromas, dark cherry, spice and plums on the palate

name: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi
White Zinfandel (California)
rosé.description: Pale pink colour; fresh berry aroma and flavour; soft off-dry finish

white wine.name: Flourish Chardonnay / Viognier (Niagara)
white wine.description: Brilliant straw yellow with green highlights; floral green apple with touch of honey; dry, medium body; lively flavours of peach and apricot with hint of spicy oak

white wine.name: Open Riesling / Gewurztraminer (Niagara)
white wine.description: Clear, pale straw colour; floral, peach and hints of lychee; off-dry fruit flavours with crisp citrus finish

name: Jackson Triggs Black Reserve
Sauvignon Blanc (Niagara)
white wine.description: Pale straw colour; grapefruit, herbs and gooseberyy on the nose; light, dry, refreshing acidity and long lemony finish

white wine.name: Hardy's VR Chardonnay (Australia)
white wine.description: Bright straw, tropical and stone fruit of peaches, melon and pineapple
